snippet: Rescuers called off their search Thursday for a sailor missing since a Navy helicopter with five crew members aboard crashed off the Virginia coast, the Coast Guard said.
abstract: Coast Guard says rescuers call off their search for sailor missing since Navy helicopter with five crew members aboard crashed off the Virginia coast.
lead_paragraph: Rescuers called off their search Thursday for a sailor missing since a Navy helicopter with five crew members aboard crashed off the Virginia coast, the Coast Guard said.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
